content:
I'm happy to help you with that! However, I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have access to personal information or specific travel histories, so I didn't know about your previous trip to Las Vegas. But I can definitely help you find deals on Southwest flights to San Francisco!

To get started, I'll need to know a few details from you:

1. What are your travel dates to San Francisco? Are you flexible with your travel dates or do you have specific dates in mind?
2. Which airport in San Francisco are you planning to fly into: San Francisco International Airport (SFO) or Oakland International Airport (OAK)?
3. Are you looking for a one-way or round-trip ticket?
4. Do you have any specific preferences, such as flying out of a particular airport or at a specific time of day?

Once I have this information, I can provide you with some tips and suggestions on how to find the best deals on Southwest flights to San Francisco!
